mapper.select: SELECT cifs.id AS columnId, cifs.column_name AS columnName, cifd.id AS id, cifd.check_item_id AS checkItemId, cifs.seq AS seq, cifd.row_index AS rowIndex, cifd.column_value AS columnValue FROM check_item_form_data AS cifd LEFT JOIN check_item_form_setting AS cifs ON cifd.column_id = cifs.id WHERE cifd.check_item_id = #{item.checkItemId} AND cifd.row_index = #{item.rowIndex} AND cifd.column_id = #{item.columnId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_item_form_data(check_item_id, column_id, row_index, column_value) VALUES (#{item.checkItemId}, #{item.columnId}, #{item.rowIndex}, #{item.columnValue})
